comment: He's a great guy despite his harsh vibes, but can be scattered. Expect to get a 60 on the writing assignments, as did 90% of the class, but we mostly finished with a B. He's picky.  Would recommend asking for help during his office hours. Attendance not mandatory, but he has quizzes and assignments due in class and you'll get lost.

Great guy and knows his stuff but he can be unclear when it comes to assignments. Doesn't always stick to the syllabus & usually just tells personal stories (which are interesting) all class. Expect a pop quiz from reading articles once a week (they're easy). He's cool but I don't feel like I learned a lot or improved as a writer though.

I loved his class. You can tell his passion for journalism. I took him for writing for public com so naturally it's a hard class and he has to grade tough. He let me do extra credit at the end of the semester and bumped my grade up. He is willing to help if you reach out to him!

Duffy is a really cool dude and you can definitely tell that he has a passion for journalism. Just not the Writing class that I was taking, he said that explicitly. If you follow his writing rules and do things his way then you'll do fine in his class. Be sure to be there every class for there is an assignment due every time that we met.
Very snippy. He gets upset extremely fast. Some days he will help you and some days he doesn't care too. His work is very hard to understand and he grades crazy.

He's very knowledgeable, but also very scattered. It's hard to follow his lectures sometimes and he tends to get his classes confused. He holds you accountable and makes sure you read by giving pop quizzes or some kind of assignment every class. Does provide study guides and is good at communicating via email.

Very nice teacher, but he takes his teaching and material serious. Study and know the proper AP style grammar. Make sure to bring your AP manual to every class, it will be very helpful! Quizzes are only a few questions, but can be tough. Read the chapters! Gives a lot of assignments, but if you ask for help he is willing to help.
